sentences.en: A secluded mansion , islanded By shrubbery and fences.
sentences.cn: 用灌木丛和篱笆隔开的一座幽独的大宅.

sentences.en: a tangled mass of overgrown shrubbery
sentences.cn: 枝蔓交错、疯狂生长的灌木丛

sentences.en: April 7,2006, Anning , Yunnan, The thick shrubbery was deadly silent after the fire.
sentences.cn: 2006年4月7日, 云南省安宁市,山火卷过,密灌林里一片死寂.

sentences.en: Black - birds sang recklessly in the shrubbery, swallows were flying high, the leaves above him glistened.
sentences.cn: 灌木丛中画眉尽情地叫着, 燕子高飞, 头上的树叶子闪闪发光.

sentences.en: Forest Township, there is the village Youlin films, covering the entire territory of shrubbery.
sentences.cn: 乡有林场,村有林片, 灌木林覆盖全境.

sentences.en: He took a header into the shrubbery.
In the shrubbery creamy white varnishes the street light, is dodging the spooky light.
sentences.cn: 灌木丛中乳白青漆的街灯, 闪着幽幽的光.

sentences.en: She saw Charlotte and Belinda emerge from the shrubbery across the lawn.
sentences.cn: 她看见夏洛蒂和比琳达从草坪对过的灌木丛走出来.

sentences.en: The gardener replanted the disrooted shrubbery.
sentences.cn: 园丁把被连根拔起的灌木丛种回原处.

sentences.en: The main reason of constitute of shrubbery and its distribution of Qilian Mountain is environmental change.
sentences.cn: 以气候为主的环境条件变化是祁连山区灌木林的种类组成和分布地域改变的主要原因.

sentences.en: The men hacked away very little shrubbery.
The mountains are sparsely covered with shrubbery and trees.
sentences.cn: 山上有稀疏的灌木和树覆盖.

sentences.en: The voice seemed to be coming from the shrubbery.
sentences.cn: 声音似乎是从灌木丛里传来的.
